text: Amaro Manuel Raposo Antunes (born 27 November 1990) is a Portuguese cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Continental team . In May 2019, he was named in the startlist for the 2019 Giro d'Italia. ==Major results== ;2008 : National Junior Road Championships ::1st 20px Road race ::1st 20px Time trial ;2011 : 1st Stage 5 Toscana-Terra di Ciclismo ;2014 : 9th Overall Volta ao Alentejo : 9th Overall Volta a Portugal ;2015 : 4th Road race, National Road Championships : 10th Overall Volta a Portugal ;2016 : 1st Mountains classification Volta ao Alentejo : 4th Road race, National Road Championships : 6th Overall Volta a Portugal : 7th Overall Volta Internacional Cova da Beira : 10th Overall Volta ao Algarve ;2017 : 1st 20px Overall Troféu Joaquim Agostinho ::1st 20px Points classification ::1st 20px Mountains classification ::1st 20px Combination classification ::1st Stage 2 : 1st Clássica da Arrábida : 2nd Overall Volta a Portugal ::1st 20px Mountains classification ::1st Stage 9 : 5th Overall Volta ao Algarve ::1st Stage 5 : 5th Clássica Aldeias do Xisto : 8th Overall GP Beiras e Serra da Estrela ;2018 : 1st 20px Overall Tour of Małopolska ::1st Stage 3 : 2nd Giro dell'Appennino : 4th Overall Sibiu Cycling Tour ::1st Stage 3a (TTT) : 10th Overall Volta a la Comunitat Valenciana : 10th Overall Szlakiem Grodów Piastowskich ;2019 : 5th Time trial, National Road Championships : 8th Overall Volta ao Algarve ;2020 : 1st 20px Overall Volta a Portugal ::1st Stage 2 : 10th Overall Volta ao Algarve ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! title: Amaro Antunes
